channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW?

item.title: By: Relmstein
item.dc:creator: Relmstein
item.description:
The loot for the zone just needs to be improved to make it worth the toughness in completing the run. At the moment there are a couple of very good items that come from the zone but the scarlet cathedral is much easier to complete.
Talvish's Necklace Quest Ring from the Boss Cragfist Fire Gun from Dark Iron Dwarf
All are worth getting if you can get a group of experienced players.
item.content:encoded:
The loot for the zone just needs to be improved to make it worth the toughness in completing the run. At the moment there are a couple of very good items that come from the zone but the scarlet cathedral is much easier to complete.

Talvish’s Necklace Quest
Ring from the Boss
Cragfist
Fire Gun from Dark Iron Dwarf

All are worth getting if you can get a group of experienced players.

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description:
Uldaman!
For the most part, I thought the instance was a chore and didn't really enjoy it too much, until the final boss fight. Coming from a UO background, class/party based PVE was something new to me in WoW, and the final fight in that dungeon was my first experience with a scripted boss fight. That fight made the whole instance worth it for me, and got me even more hooked on WoW than I already was.
item.content:encoded:
Uldaman!

For the most part, I thought the instance was a chore and didn’t really enjoy it too much, until the final boss fight. Coming from a UO background, class/party based PVE was something new to me in WoW, and the final fight in that dungeon was my first experience with a scripted boss fight. That fight made the whole instance worth it for me, and got me even more hooked on WoW than I already was.

item.title: By: Brent Michael Krupp
item.dc:creator: Brent Michael Krupp
item.description:
Yeah, Uldaman is nifty, especially things like the Indiana Jones room. But they really need to take out at least half of the trash mobs in the place. Runs take forever and not because they're that hard (except the final fight) but because there is just so damn much crap to clear and that many more chances for a boo-boo to wipe the party.
The tunnels full of bats and scorps and basilisks are the worst, IMO.
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, Uldaman is nifty, especially things like the Indiana Jones room. But they really need to take out at least half of the trash mobs in the place. Runs take forever and not because they’re that hard (except the final fight) but because there is just so damn much crap to clear and that many more chances for a boo-boo to wipe the party.

The tunnels full of bats and scorps and basilisks are the worst, IMO.

item.title: By: Pietoro
item.dc:creator: Pietoro
item.description:
I've always found Uldaman a horror to PUG. Or find a group for, period. The overall loot isn't justifable enough for most people to want to go through it. And its a shame, because it has a great (and important) lore chunk in it.
From the untied ends that lead towards Ul'dum's premise, I really can't wait til that instance is opened. The Makers returning to Azeroth, and being able to explore the lab that they used to design the planet just sound like they'll be awesome events.
item.content:encoded:
I’ve always found Uldaman a horror to PUG. Or find a group for, period. The overall loot isn’t justifable enough for most people to want to go through it. And its a shame, because it has a great (and important) lore chunk in it.

From the untied ends that lead towards Ul’dum’s premise, I really can’t wait til that instance is opened. The Makers returning to Azeroth, and being able to explore the lab that they used to design the planet just sound like they’ll be awesome events.

item.title: By: Dreaming
item.dc:creator: Dreaming
item.description: How many people get tells twice a day for run throughs of that place? Or is that just a warrior phenomena?
item.content:encoded: How many people get tells twice a day for run throughs of that place? Or is that just a warrior phenomena?

item.title: By: Silvanis
item.dc:creator: Silvanis
item.description: I've always wondered why you can't grab some of those piles of gold coins...
item.content:encoded: I’ve always wondered why you can’t grab some of those piles of gold coins…

item.title: By: heather
item.dc:creator: heather
item.description: Gaah, the boss just before this always drives me nuts! Really nifty plot though.
item.content:encoded: Gaah, the boss just before this always drives me nuts! Really nifty plot though.

item.title: By: Roger
item.dc:creator: Roger
item.description: This is the treasure room behind the final boss in Uldaman. The instance is long, but the quest that starts in that room is one of the best in the whole game. WELL worth the effort, imo.
item.content:encoded: This is the treasure room behind the final boss in Uldaman. The instance is long, but the quest that starts in that room is one of the best in the whole game. WELL worth the effort, imo.

item.title: By: gesikah
item.dc:creator: gesikah
item.description: Aye, the damnable Uldaman, after the big circle room.
item.content:encoded: Aye, the damnable Uldaman, after the big circle room.

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description: the biggest dissappointment zone in the game. I was quite excited to check out uldam afterwards. And then i found out it wasnt finished..
item.content:encoded: the biggest dissappointment zone in the game. I was quite excited to check out uldam afterwards. And then i found out it wasnt finished..
